item.title: scons
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: SCons SCons Wiki Frontpage Single HTML Manpage SCons Construction Variables om bvb de compiler te specifiëren. Opsplitsen SConstruct en SConscript Waarom? http://www.scons.org/doc/2.1.0/HTML/scons-user/c3356.html Build output definiëren, duplicate source files, etc. Voorbeeld SConstruct file: SConscript('SConscript', variant_dir######'build', duplicate0) Voorbeeld file om Google Test mee te (proberen) builden SConscript: def Glob( pattern ###### '*.*', dir '.' ): import os, fnmatch files = [] for file in os.listdir( Dir(dir).srcnode().abspath ): if fnmatch.
